body_html: I dont see big value in getting this PR into pytorch itself. pickle.HIGHEST is simple enough to specify to torch.save. If you want to save on a single import pickle, you should write your own util.save that wraps torch.save.
body_text: I dont see big value in getting this PR into pytorch itself. pickle.HIGHEST is simple enough to specify to torch.save. If you want to save on a single import pickle, you should write your own util.save that wraps torch.save.
body: I dont see big value in getting this PR into pytorch itself. `pickle.HIGHEST` is simple enough to specify to `torch.save`. If you want to save on a single `import pickle`, you should write your own `util.save` that wraps `torch.save`.
